name: Can't stand + V-ing
meaning: To not be able to suffer/tolerant something
examples: I can't stand looking at drowsy people in my office

name: Can't help + V-ing
meaning: To not be able to control/stop something
examples: I can't help thinking about the prestigious/reputable achievement

name: Work out
meaning: To train the body by physical exercise
examples: Working out at a gym or swim twice a week is necessary for me
He has many health issues so he choose to work out every day

name: Wear out
meaning: To make yourself/somebody feel very tired
examples: The past few days had really worn him out
We extremely wore out because newcomers didn't integrate with our working tradition

name: Drop off
meaning: To fall into a light sleep
examples: I dropped off and missed the end of the movie

name: Get round to
meaning: To find the time to do something
examples: It takes hours and hours just to get round to do this work
